Package Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters

The Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image processing filters running in parallel.

See: Description

Package Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters Description

The Catalano.Imaging.Concurrent.Filters namespace contains collection classes, which provide different image processing filters running in parallel.
